CalvesKneeling.name: Kneeling Shin Stretch
CalvesKneeling.preparation: Kneel on both knees with buttocks over both heels and feet extend back.
CalvesKneeling.execution: Sit down on or toward heels. Hold stretch.
CalvesKneeling.comments: Do not allow feet to wing out and do not sit between ankles. Certain knee problems maybe aggravated by this stretch.

CalvesLying.name: Lying Shin Stretch
CalvesLying.preparation: Lie on one side. Grasp top forefoot behind.
CalvesLying.execution: Pull forefoot to lower back. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite foot.
CalvesLying.comments: See Lying (side) Quadriceps Stretch for similar exercise which can be combined with this stretch and performed simultaneously.

CalvesSeated.name: Seated Shin Stretch
CalvesSeated.preparation: Sit on chair or bench and cross lower leg over thigh of opposite leg. Place one hand above ankle and other hand on top of your foot.
CalvesSeated.execution: Pull forefoot to extend ankle. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.

CalvesStanding.name: Standing Shin Stretch
CalvesStanding.preparation: Stand and touch wall or stationary object for balance. Grasp forefoot behind.
CalvesStanding.execution: Pull forefoot to lower back. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
CalvesStanding.comments: See Standing Quadriceps Stretch for similar exercise which can be combined with this stretch and performed simultaneously.
